entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Norman Wells
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:04 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Norman Wells Airport 08:43 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: WNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of snow and ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:03 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 08:03 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:03 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
